com.scaleoutsoftware.soss.cache

Class ScaleoutCachingProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scaleoutsoftware.soss.cache.ScaleoutCachingProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, javax.cache.spi.CachingProvider

    public class ScaleoutCachingProvider
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.cache.spi.CachingProvider
    A CachingProvider implementation that provides ScaleoutCacheManagers.
